statements: SELECT * FROM masked_personal_data;
SELECT id, first_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM masked_personal_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM masked_personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE date_of_birth = '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM masked_personal_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '1999-12-31' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM masked_personal_data WHERE last_name IN ('Smith', 'Johnson', 'Williams') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email FROM personal_data WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM personal_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM personal_data WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM personal_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM personal_data;
SELECT * FROM personal_data;
SELECT name, email FROM personal_data;
SELECT address FROM personal_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM personal_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name, address FROM personal_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE address = '123 Main St' OR email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT id, name, address, phone_number, email FROM personal_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PersonalInfo;
SELECT id, name, email FROM PersonalInfo WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AddressInfo WHERE city = 'New York';

SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM PaymentInfo WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
